channel.title: Youtube: Community Channel
channel.description:
Hey guys, I got my 1080p HD PVR for Christmas and I love to game so I decided to start a community channel. Basically for those who don't know what a community channel is I accept your recorded clips on different games of cool glitches/tricks/downright pownage lol and you can do your own commentary or I'll add one. I also like to trickshot/quickscope etc on the CoD series. Thanks guys.
Youtube: [URL=http://www.youtube.com/ohhArios]www.youtube.com/ohhArios[/url]
PSN: AriosHD
Xbox, PS3, and PC recordings are accepted, and if you do something epic in real life and I like the vid I may accept it!
Edit: Just to clear up confusion, I will accept glitches/easter egg recordings even though I do not support bug abusing in the games. I will, however, only accept your glitch/easter egg recordings if they do not give you an unfair advantage and are just cool to look at etc.

item.title: Youtube: Community Channel
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

[quote=“Kodiak, post:8, topic:477597”]um yes

edit: i see what you mean now going fullscreen and hd makes it look good as new, also thats the only recording ive ever had that looked that bad, thats strange.[/quote]
If you used a video editing software (which I’m sure you did), you probably need to fix your render settings. Personally, I would record 720p if I were you.

Read full topic

um yes

item.title: Youtube: Community Channel
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

The quality of your video is terrible for a 1080p HD PVR. It supports HDMI, right?

Read full topic

item.title: Youtube: Community Channel
item.dc:creator: @Kodiak Kodiak
item.description:
@Kodiak wrote:

[quote=“eyeownyew, post:5, topic:477597”]This makes me want an HD PVR

Could we put PC vids on it? I could record Skyrim or something (that’s never been done before).[/quote]

I will gladly accept your pc vids (but please have a descent quality), but I do not like uploading Potato recordings. Lmao, but anyways make the content interesting to the viewers, like show a cool glitch/trick/easter egg you know blah blah blah.

Read full topic

item.title: Youtube: Community Channel
item.dc:creator: @Kodiak Kodiak
item.description:
@Kodiak wrote:

rip4d:

Don’t forget Xbox! I actually have an HD PVR too, and while its only 720p it still works nicely. I could probably help contribute clips if need be.

While I started my online gaming on xbox, I have now converted to PS3, but I will not for any reason turn down a xbox recording, so feel free to send those in. I’ll add xbox included to the OP.

Read full topic
